description:
The most-wanted brands.  Up to 70% off.  Dominate boot season and bring the best shopping experience to your pocket with the award winning Rue La La apps. New Boutiques open every day at 11AM ET.  30 Days of Free Shipping is yours on the app after your first purchase.  

New Boutiques launch every day at 11AM ET and feature an impeccably curated selection of the best fashion, shoes, accessories, beauty, home goods, travel and more to help you transform your fall lifestyle.  Our most popular items sell out super quickly, but with the app you will never miss a “can’t live without it” bag or the perfect gift again.  Transform your closet and your lifestyle with the Rue La La apps.  

Not a Rue La La Member?  No problem!  It’s free and you can join quickly from the app!  We know you’ll love it, so take it for a spin.  If you have questions, just contact mobile@ruelala.com and we’d be happy to help make your experience better.

The Rue La La apps are amazing! Here are some of the amazing features on our iOS 8 Compatible iPhone and iPad apps:

+  Get exclusive access to app user only sales.  (Note: Make sure you have push notifications enabled to be alerted when these Boutiques go live.) 
+  Free Shipping for 30 days after you make your first purchase on the apps.
+  Checkout in just 2 taps.
+  Stay logged in so you can get to the Boutiques faster. 
+  Get gift inspiration (can you believe it’s fall already?).
+  See upcoming brands and add them to your device calendar so you don’t miss out (app-only feature).
+  Filter Boutiques by category, brand, color, and size.
+  Sort Boutiques by best sellers and price.
+  Add new credit cards with our easy to use credit card scanning functionality
+  Add a product to your bag on one device and finish checking out while you walk to your next meeting with our seamless cart that stays with you across devices.
+  See what’s selling with “What’s Hot” feature.
+  Share those sought after boots with your friends via Pinterset, Facebook, Twitter, email or SMS  (they’ll love you for it!).
+  Track your order from your apps.
+  Manage your account info on the run.


Frequently Asked Questions 

Q:  How Do I Update my iPhone (4s or later) or iPad (2 or later) to iOS 8?

    + Open the device Settings
    + Tap General > Software Update
    + Tap Download and Install 
    + Enter your iTunes Account password
    + Tap Agree option when the Terms and Conditions screen appears.


Q:  How do I turn on the app-only push notification alerts, so I never miss a Boutique opening?

    + To turn on push notifications, first turn them on from your iPhone or iPad’s settings.  
    + Open the device Settings
    + Tap Notification Center > Rue La La
    + Set your Alert Style to Banners or Alerts
    + Slide Show in Notification Center to green
    + Slide Show on Lock Screen to green.
    + Then you’re all set!

Have a question? 
Email mobilehelp@ruelala.com or contact a Rue La La Concierge at 1-888-992-LALA (5252).

For more details about our apps, please visit www.ruelala.com/mobile
trackCensoredName: Rue La La - Shop Designer Apparel, Home Décor & More. Up to 70% off.

releaseNotes:
Your must-have shopping companion has been updated just in time for the holidays.  Skip the lines this season and shop for everyone on your list with our award winning apps.  

+ Check out the “Gifts” header in the navigation to get gifting inspiration and to start checking off your list.
+ Made performance improvements to our credit card scanner and the iOS 8 Today on Rue La La widget.
+ Fixed a bunch of bugs including one that crashed the app when editing items in your cart or when moving between product pages and the product list pages.
+ Keep an eye out for holiday delivery messaging in the app to ensure your package arrives onetime.  

For more details about our apps, please visit www.ruelala.com/mobile

Love the Rue La La apps?  Please take a moment to review us in the app store.
